name: Human Rights Consortium
goal: The Consortium is a broad alliance of civil society organisations from across all communities, sectors and areas of Northern Ireland who work together to help develop a human rights based society.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives: Main work is to ensure that there is no diminution of rights and equality standards in Northern Ireland as a result of the Brexit process, including by protecting the Belfast/Good Friday Agreement.
